name: Doctor Archer
description:
"space bar" to jump, "X" to shoot.

..Illegal Drug...some people smoke or use and cannot stop using. I hate people who create drug, I hate people who can't stop using continuing, I hate drug itself.  That's why I made this.  The world is full of such sh0t. The world looks like this to my eyes....

If I have more time to develop this game, I would like to add new enemy, new movement of the enemy and power up items, if I can..
